name: Skate Dude (Joeysquatch12)
description:
DISCLAIMER: GAME DOES NOT RUN IN FULLSCREEN!

 If you can't open the installer, then follow this guide: How to fix 'This app has been blocked for your protection' prompt on Windows 10 PC | Windows Central I'm sorry, but I don't know how to change the problem. However, I scanned the file for viruses and there were none, so you're safe!

CONTROLS AND DESKTOP SHORTCUT INSTALLATION TUTORIAL BELOW

Welcome to Skate Dude, a simple little skateboarding game! Please comment if you find any bugs!

-------------------------------Controls------------------------------

IMPORTANT: If you can't move, restart the game and press space! 

For keyboard controls, press Space to Ollie, press the left arrow when in the air to do a Kickflip, the right arrow while in the air to do a Method, Ollie onto the rail and press the up arrow to do a Bluntslide, roll up the kicker ramp to do a Backflip, and go up the quarter pipe to do Handplant! When facing up or down press space to do a sideways ollie! Combine tricks in different orientations to do a combo!

 ---------------DESKTOP SHORTCUT INSTALLATION---------------

Can't find the game on your device? To install the game's shortcut to your desktop follow these steps:

1. Press the windows key and type in file explorer, then press enter.

2. Find your hard drive directory (For me it says Windows (C:))

3. At the top bar where it says view, click on it, then click show, then check hidden items and file name extensions.

4. Go to Users>Your Username>AppData>Local>Programs>Skate Dude.

5. Right click on Skate Dude.exe and select Show More Options. If you don't see that skip to the next step, or right click on the picture of the app (The one with the waving person).

6. Click on Create Shortcut.

7. On the new shortcut you created, left click it and on your keyboard hold CTRL and press C. (Or right click it and select copy.)

8. Go to your desktop folder and hold CTRL and tap V on your keyboard.

9. All done! You should see the game show up on your desktop. Enjoy!
